en-US.summary: Alexa will tell you the elementary lunch menu for today or tomorrow for Papillion LaVista Elementary Schools
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Papio Menu what's for lunch today
Alexa, ask Papio Menu what is for lunch tomorrow
Alexa, ask Papio Menu what are we having for lunch on Friday
en-US.name: Papio Menu Lunch Bot
en-US.description:
Hear the elementary lunch menu for Papillion La-Vista Schools from Alexa by saying:
"Alexa ask Papio Menu what's for lunch today"
or "Alexa ask Papio Menu what is for lunch tomorrow"
or "Alexa ask Papio Menu what are we having for lunch on Friday"
en-US.updatesDescription: New for Papio Elementary students! Say: "Alexa, ask Papio Menu what's for lunch today"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Alexa, ask Papio Menu what's for lunch today
Alexa, ask Papio Menu what is for lunch tomorrow
Alexa, ask Papio Menu what are we having for lunch on Friday
